articles.title: Dave Ramsey Says Your 'Little Butt Should Eat at Home' If You're Poor—Not Blow $13 On A Meal You Can Cook For $4, Leftovers Are Reality Of Being Broke
articles.mainIdea: Dave Ramsey Says Your 'Little Butt Should Eat at Home' If You're Poor—Not Blow $13 On A Meal You Can Cook For $4, Leftovers Are Reality Of Being Broke
articles.summary: Benzinga: Dave Ramsey Says Your 'Little Butt Should Eat at Home' If You're Poor—Not Blow $13 On A Meal You Can Cook For $4, Leftovers Are Reality Of Being Broke. Apparently, reminding people that cooking dinner at home is cheaper than grabbing takeout is enough to set the internet on fire. That's exactly what happened when "The Ramsey Show" posted a 10-second clip of co-host George Kamel giving a basic inflation-era tip during a live event: if you're broke, stop eating out. It wasn't meant to stir outrage. But it did. And Dave Ramsey responded the only way Dave Ramsey knows how—with a flamethrower. "I never dreamed, George, that you would actually post o
